revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 2404 |revision=V1 |asin= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed=256 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMIC |fla1_model=A29L320ATV-70F <!-- SST39VF3201 --> |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;SiGe;SE2521A60;;1; ,,, PWM Controller;Intersil;ISL6445IAZ;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:19:4B |oui_eth=00:19:4B }}
The [[Sagemcom]] F@ST 2404 is a wireless router provided :by ''Sky'' Broadband for their ADSL subscribers.
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/sagem/fast2404 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :00:19:4B OUI ('''Sagem''') *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=21835 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :"252619218" and "ROHS" is silkscreened on the board. :"252819194" is printed on a label attached to the board.
{{See also|Sagemcom F@ST 2504|Sagemcom F@ST 2704|Sagemcom}} <!--([http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=735539 4pda])-->
===Specifications=== *[http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3223/sagem-f-st-2504-adsl22-802-11bg-router-teardown ''Sagem F@ST 2504 ADSL2+ 802.11bg Router'' Teardown on '''Electronics360'''] :MPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6348SKFBG - ADSL2 + CPE Device - Single-Chip, ::w/ Integrated CPU, Transceiver and AFE Host Interface :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM5325E (KQMG) - FE 5-Port, 10/100 Base-T/TX :Flash: ''SST'' SST39VF3201-70-4C-EKE - NOR, 32Mb (2M x 16) 90ns :RAM: 2x ''AMIC'' A43L2616V-7F - 64Mb (1M x 16Bit x 4Banks) 3.3V, 143MHz :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4318 (KFBG) - Baseband - Single-Chip, 802.1b/g :RF FE: ''SiGe Semiconductor'' SE2521A60 - 802.1b/g, w/ Integrated PAM, ::TX Filter, DPDT T/R amd Diversity Switches & Power :PWM Controller: [[Intersil]] ISL6445IAZ - Dual, Step-Down, 1.4MHz :Power Supply: (Wall Plug-In Accessory) External AC Power Adapter :KSAC1200075W1UK: 200-240V AC ~50/60Hz 0.4A, 12V DC, 0.75A, 9W
===See also=== *[[Sagemcom F@ST 2804 V2]] (''MTS'') - [[Broadcom]] BCM6458U (RKFBG) (2x <!--MIPS--> @300MHz) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 2804 V7]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM63281 (KFBG) / BCM43217T (KMLG) <!--([http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=735539 4PDA])-->
